sql-descriptor.sql: CREATE TABLE ESACDTP( SYS_ID VARCHAR(18), CD_TYP VARCHAR(18), CD_TYP_NM VARCHAR(60), USE_YN CHAR(1), REM VARCHAR(128), STS CHAR(1), REG_ID VARCHAR(18), REG_DT TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE(17), MOD_ID VARCHAR(18), MOD_DT TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE(17), CONSTRAINT ESACDTP_PK PRIMARY KEY ( SYS_ID, CD_TYP ) )

WITH T01(C01, C02, C03, C04, C05) AS ( SELECT 1, 'ESACDTP' , 'SYS_ID', 'VARCHAR', 18 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 2, 'ESACDTP' , 'CD_TYP', 'VARCHAR', 18 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 3, 'ESACDTP' , 'CD_TYP_NM', 'VARCHAR', 60 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 4, 'ESACDTP' , 'USE_YN', 'CHAR', 1 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 5, 'ESACDTP' , 'REM', 'VARCHAR', 128 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 6, 'ESACDTP' , 'STS', 'CHAR', 1 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 7, 'ESACDTP' , 'REG_ID', 'VARCHAR', 18 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 8, 'ESACDTP' , 'REG_DT', 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE', 17 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 9, 'ESACDTP' , 'MOD_ID', 'VARCHAR', 18 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 10, 'ESACDTP' , 'MOD_DT', 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE', 17 FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.COLUMN_NAME IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END CHK_YN ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAB_COLUMNS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = A.C02 AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.C03 ORDER BY A.C01

sql-descriptor.sq: WITH T01 ( SYS_ID ,CD_TYP ,CD_TYP_NM ,USE_YN ,REM ,STS ,REG_ID ,REG_DT ,MOD_ID ,MOD_DT ) AS ( SELECT '100', 'CA' , '공법관리', 'Y', NULL, 'C', 'TSA00024', '2022-04-29 16:00:51.0 Asia/Seoul', NULL, '2022-04-29 16:00:51.0 Asia/Seoul' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '100', 'WCA', '부품원가산정', 'Y', NULL, 'C', 'ADMIN', '2010-03-29 13:55:16.0 Asia/Seoul', 'ADMIN', '2010-03-29 13:55:16.0 Asia/Seoul' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.SYS_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN ESACDTP B ON B.SYS_ID = A.SYS_ID AND B.CD_TYP = A.CD_TYP
